commonInfo.introWords: Hi there! I'm highly qualified specialist in program development, with good knowledge and expirience in frontend and server development, math, command work. I like decide complicated and not standard tasks, write clear, extendable and strict code, self-development. Other information about me you can look up at this website or at print version of my cv.
